resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81249</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81249</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4636</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Informal Letters Worksheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo de cartas informales</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre ar Litreacha Neamhfhoirmiúla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formloser Zeichen-Bogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau Sans cérémonie de Lettres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Informal Das Letras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro Informale Delle Lettere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ατυπο φύλλο εργασίας επιστολών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet outlining the basic components of an informal letter, including a list of phrases that can be used. Should be added to for more senior classes.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que describe los componentes básicos de una carta informal, está incluida una lista de frases que se pueden utilizar. Debería añadirse para clases superiores.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre a imlíníonn na bun-chomhábhair de litir neamhfhoirmiúil, lena n-áirítear liosta frásaí ar féidir a úsáid. Ba cheart cur leis do ranganna níos sinsearaigh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">French</string>
            <string language="es">Francés. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Fraincis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, der die grundlegenden Bestandteile eines 
formlosen Zeichens, einschließlich eine Liste der Phrasen umreißt, 
die verwendet werden können. Wenn für ältereren Kategorien 
hinzugefügt Sie seien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau traçant les grandes lignes des composants 
de base d'une lettre sans cérémonie, y compris une liste 
d'expressions qui peuvent être utilisées. Si soyez ajouté à 
pour des classes plus aînées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha que esboça os componentes básicos de uma 
letra informal, including uma lista das frases que podem ser usadas. 
Se seja adicionado para a umas classes mais sênior.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro che descrive i componenti di base 
di una lettera informale, compreso una lista delle frasi che possono 
essere usate. Se sia aggiunto per ai codici categoria maggiori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που περιγράφει τα βασικά συστατικά 
μιας άτυπης επιστολής, συμπεριλαμβανομένου ενός καταλόγου 
φράσεων που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί. Πρέπει να προστεθείτε
για τις ανώτερες κλάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Français</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Francese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <identifier>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
